thread.title_full: Sun Kil Moon Announces New Album Common As Light and Love Are Red Valleys of Blood | Pitchfork

title: Sun Kil Moon Announces New Album Common As Light and Love Are Red Valleys of Blood | Pitchfork
text:
Sun Kil Moon Announces New Album Common As Light and Love Are Red Valleys of Blood Plus read Conor Oberst’s interview with Mark Kozelek about the album Sun Kil Moon Photo by Dustin Finkelstein/Getty Images for SXSW 
Sun Kil Moon has a new album coming out February 17 on Rough Trade . Common As Light and Love Are Red Valleys of Blood is about “events from January to August of 2016 and how Mark processed it all while traveling,” according to the Rough Trade album listing. Head here to read an interview with Mark Kozelek about the album, conducted by Conor Oberst; it covers Trump, Kozelek’s relationship to rap music, his distaste for the internet, and more.
